name: Wayne Tower (Reeves)
description: The central headquarters of Wayne Enterprises in Gotham City as depicted in 'The Batman' (2022).

content.title: History
content.body: Wayne Tower serves as the headquarters for Wayne Enterprises, a multinational conglomerate founded by the Wayne family. Over the years, it has stood as a symbol of Gotham City's architectural splendor and a testament to the Wayne family's enduring influence in the city. Despite Gotham's troubled history, Wayne Tower has remained a beacon of innovation and progress amid the city's chaos.

content.title: Geography
content.body: Located in the heart of Gotham City, Wayne Tower is prominently situated amid the city's bustling metropolitan area. Its iconic structure is a recognizable feature of Gotham's skyline, towering above many of the surrounding buildings. The tower's design incorporates elements of Neo-Gothic architecture, reflecting the city's dark and brooding atmosphere.

content.title: Notable Features
content.body: The most notable feature of Wayne Tower is its eye-catching spire, an architectural marvel that can be seen from various points in Gotham City. The interior of Wayne Tower includes state-of-the-art facilities for Wayne Enterprises' various business ventures and research projects. The tower also houses the private offices of Bruce Wayne, providing him a strategic base of operations for his endeavors as Batman.

content.title: Story Significance
content.body: Wayne Tower plays a critical role in 'The Batman' (2022), serving not only as a place of business for Bruce Wayne but also as a symbol of hope and continuity for Gotham. Key scenes take place within and around the tower, underscoring its importance as both a setting and a narrative device in the film.
